summary: THE FUEL PUMP ON MY 1999 LINCOLN TOWN CAR WENT OUT WITHOUT WARNING.  THE VEHICLE HAS HAD NUMEROUS PROBLEMS SINCE PURCHASE INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO: FUEL PUMP, DIGITAL DISPLAY (SPEEDOMETER, MILEAGE, COMPASS, TEMPERATURE), PASSENGER WINDOW POWER MECHANISM (WINDOW WILL NOT GO UP COMPLETELY IF LOWERED) AND SUSPENSION PROBLEMS.  CURRENT ISSUE REGARDS FUEL PUMP.  TOTAL COST TO REPAIR INCLUDE $403.00 LABOR, $257.49 PARTS (FUEL PUMP), $25.00 MISC FEES, $16.72 TAX, $215.00 TOWING.  *NLM
